channel.title: Posts on Kayo Yin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kayo Yin's Blog

item.title: A Love Letter to Paris
item.description: I was feeling particularly nostalgic about my childhood in Paris tonight, and I remembered this speech I wrote when I was 17. It is pretty silly and a little cringeworthy, but I wanted to discreetly share it here.

item.title: NeuroMV: A Neural Music Visualizer
item.description: In this project, we visualize songs using images that pulsate and move along with the music using Compositional Pattern Producing Networks (CPPN).
